item.description:
Hi Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Friends
We will be meeting at our home in Westport and then heading to the beach in town!
Last time we had Robin with her adorable puppies and Isabella their mom! I could see how much attention the puppies get! the people just love them! We also had Lillie and Katie.Rocky and Roxie just love playing with all of their friends!
Join us for a beach run!!!
Bob and Linda Bramwell

group.name: The Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Group

item.name: The Westport Boston Terrier November Meetup
